name: 3d-previewer
description: 3D objects previewer that allows users to interact and carry out certain basic operations on loaded objects, enabling their analysis in detail

scripts.build: concurrently 'npm run build --prefix client' 'npm run build --prefix server'
scripts.build:dev: concurrently 'npm run build:dev --prefix client' 'npm run build:dev --prefix server'
scripts.heroku-prebuild: rm -r client package.json && mv server/* . && rm -r server
scripts.i: [ -d node_modules ] && (concurrently 'npm i' 'npm i --prefix client' 'npm i --prefix server') || (npm i && npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server)
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm start --prefix client' 'npm run build:dev --prefix server && npm start --prefix server'

author: Jose Maria Rivera Alonso (https://github.com/Chema22R)
